name: aqua-agent
preInstallNotes: You should have aqua-web and aqua-gateway running before performing the installation.  This DC/OS Service is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Experimental packages should never be used in production!
postUninstallNotes: Aqua agent master container has been removed. However, you will need to SSH into the nodes and run the Aqua uninstall script to completely remove Aqua.
